title: fail to load shared preview for images on chrome
body:
hi,

if i try to open a image on a shared link the loading takes more than 5 minutes in chrome and the page is not responding.

example: https://cloud.indeedgeek.de/public.php?service=files&t=067520e7f0261a000a4919edea15fec9

tested with and without ssl. fails on both.
tested on three different networks. fails on all.
tested with and without ipv6. fails on both.
tested with owncloud 5.0.6 and owncloud 5.0.7.
tested with windows 7, mac os x and gentoo linux. fails on all.

fails only for big image. example is 1.2 mb and fails. another image i tested (200 kb) was working.
if the image is in browser cache it works.
other tabs try to access the same owncloud don't work as well as log as chrome tries to open the shared link.

firefox and safari are working fine. chrome/chromium 27 fails to load image.
server: debian 6.0.7, apache 2.2.16, php 5.3.3.
no output in error.log

if i load only the image everything works fine. if i disable javascript it works fine if i disable images it doesn't work.

chrome developer console shows some issues with the picture but nothing useful:

![screenshot01](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/122946/660061/cdbe6d24-d6e0-11e2-816e-aa5b95fdfc9a.png)
![screenshot02](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/122946/660065/ec1fab16-d6e0-11e2-9abd-00a4656bad0a.png)
![screenshot03](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/122946/660064/ec063b18-d6e0-11e2-9380-3cab797515d2.png)
![screenshot04](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/122946/660063/ebfa882c-d6e0-11e2-93be-349a1af964f4.png)

has someone a hint what i can try? i don't know how to debug further.
